post:
HostSnowy is running a new promotion. The next 50 orders are entitled for a 50% discount for the **first 3 months**, use promo code **THREEMONTHSHALF**. **_Note that after the first three months the recurring price will return to normal_**.

Our Servers are located in Netherlands.
Download: http://www.hostsnowy.com/100mb.test
Test IP: 77.95.225.199

Any questions / comments please send an email to sales@hostsnowy.com.
